=E2=80=8BHello Dominik,

A few things you can do:

Avoid writing 404s to yo=
ur warcs. See
https://groups.yahoo.com/neo/groups/archive-crawler/conversat=
ions/messages/8657

Disable ExtractorJS, likely the source of many of your =
404s. You might miss
some good content, though.

Try a recent heritrix snap=
shot. ExtractorJS has been refined to produce
fewer bad links.
http://build=
s.archive.org/maven2/org/archive/heritrix/heritrix/3.3.0-SNAPSHOT/heritrix-=
3.3.0-SNAPSHOT-dist.zip

Noah


=E2=80=8B

On Mon, Aug 1, 2016 at 6:01 AM, =
domifrey@... [archive-crawler] <
archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com> wrote:=


>
>
> Hello,
>
> I am running a domain crawl and heritrix crawls lot's of=
 404 pages. Thus I
> want to exclude 404 pages from the crawl. How can I co=
nfigure Heritrix to
> skip pages with this response code?
>
>
> responsecod=
e-report.txt
>
> [#urls] [rescode]
>
> 259449 200
> 178721 404
> 691 301
> =
402 1
> 108 302
>
>
> Thank you and best regards
>
> Dominik
>
>
>
>
>
> 
>=


--001a11466d9a794bd40539074620

<p><span>Hello,</span></p><p><span>I am running a=
 domain crawl and heritrix crawls lot's of 404 pages. Thus I want to ex=
clude 404 pages from the crawl. How can I configure Heritrix to skip pages =
with this response code?</span></p><p><span><br></span></p><p><span>respons=
ecode-report.txt</span></p><p><span style=3D"line-height:normal;white-space=
:pre-wrap;word-spacing:normal">[#urls] [rescode]</span></p><p><span></span>=
</p><pre style=3D"line-height:normal;word-wrap:break-word">259449 200
17872=
1 404
691 301
402 1
108 302
</pre><pre style=3D"line-height:normal;word-wra=
p:break-word"><br></pre><p>Thank you and best regards</p><p>Dominik</p><p><=
span><br></span></p><p><br></p>
